name: Murder Diaries: Ankara
description: You have to find the exit without losing your sanity through fighting the monsters behind the locked doors...
minimum_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
